data.title: Train derailed just outside Groningen station, train traffic halted.
data.meta_description: The fire department assumes that insulation material caught fire in a building under construction.
data.text:
Summary by NOS

The fire department assumes that insulation material caught fire in a building under construction.

rd.nl

Construction begins at bus station site in Groningen, train traffic is at a standstill.

A large fire is raging at the construction site of a new bus station in Groningen, near the train station. A NL-Alert has been issued to warn people to stay out of the smoke and area. Train traffic between Groningen Europapark and Groningen is currently suspended due to the fire.

24 days ago

Read Full Article
